name: Rainy Day - Week 1
description: Created a soft image by overlapping circles with random colors. It is inspired by raindrops on a rainy day and the rainbow reflected on them with a lowered transparency.

name: Rose Window - Week 1
description: The main idea is to create a more structured and grid-like pattern where shapes are aligned in rows and columns, looking like a mosiac in a church window.

name: Nested Squares - Week 1
description: This variation is inspired by nested square pattens and line thickness variations, I created a piece that features a grid of nested squares with varying stroke weights and colors, set against a cloud perlin noise.

name: Explosion - Week 2&3
description: Popping colors and shapes that look like an explosion. This piece is inspired by the fireworks and the CodePen Home Creative Coding - Particle experiment by Garrit.
